# Bio

:::float-image

```{r out.width='200px', out.extra='style="float:right; margin-left:15px; margin-right:15px; clip-path: circle();"', echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AtlasOfLivingAustralia/SDS_website/main/images/people/jenna.jpg")
```

Jenna is a conservation scientist with a PhD in Plant Ecology. She is currently the business and scientific analyst for EcoCommons Australia. Her role is to bring cutting-edge and best practice science and data to the EcoCommons platform. Jenna is a strong advocate for diversity and inclusion in STEMM fields.
